/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban structures. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A large billboard stands out on the left side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky creating a visually appealing palette.
